dict.string:
#!/usr/bin/env bash [[ -f "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" ]] && . "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh"
# set defaultCStringEncoding to UTF-8 if diff --strip-trailing-cr --label "${TM_DISPLAYNAME}" --label "(clipboard)" -u - <(__CF_USER_TEXT_ENCODING=$UID:0x8000100:0x8000100 pbpaste); then echo "There are no differences." else exit_create_new_document fi
